00021         string TextParser::trim(const string &str) const
00022         {
00023             string::size_type pos1 = str.find_first_not_of(' ');
00024             string::size_type pos2 = str.find_last_not_of(' ');
00025             return str.substr(pos1 == string::npos ? 0 : pos1,
00026                     pos2 == string::npos ? str.length() - 1 : pos2 - pos1 + 1);
00027         }
00028 
00029         void TextParser::split(const string &str, const string &characters,
00030                 vector<string> &destination) const
00031         {
00032             string::size_type start = str.find_first_not_of(characters);
00033             string::size_type end = str.find_first_of(characters, start + 1);
00034             while(start != string::npos && end != string::npos) {
00035                 destination.push_back(str.substr(start, end - start));
00036                 start = str.find_first_not_of(characters, end + 1);
00037                 end = str.find_first_of(characters, start);
00038             }
00039 
00040             if(start != string::npos)
00041                 destination.push_back(str.substr(start));
00042         }
00043 
00044         void TextParser::replaceAll(string &text, const string &from,
00045                 const string &to) const
00046         {
00047             size_t lookHere = 0;
00048             size_t foundHere;
00049             while((foundHere = text.find(from, lookHere)) != string::npos) {
00050                 text.replace(foundHere, from.size(), to);
00051                 lookHere = foundHere + to.size();
00052             }
00053         }
00054 
00055         Color TextParser::parseColor(const string &str) const
00056         {
00057             if(str.length() == 7) {
00058                 if(str[0] == '#') {
00059                     stringstream redStream(str.substr(1,2));
00060                     stringstream greenStream(str.substr(3,2));
00061                     stringstream blueStream(str.substr(5,2));
00062                     int red, green, blue;
00063                     redStream >> hex >> red;
00064                     greenStream >> hex >> green;
00065                     blueStream >> hex >> blue;
00066                     return Color( (float)red / (float)0xff,
00067                                   (float)green / (float)0xff,
00068                                   (float)blue / (float)0xff );
00069                 }
00070             }
00071 
00072             return Color();
00073         }
00074     }
00075 }
